scripts.build: node scripts/generate-blog.js --all && vite build && node scripts/generate-ai-pages.js && node scripts/generate-sitemap.js
scripts.lighthouse: pnpm build && pnpm preview --port 4173 & sleep 3 && lighthouse http://localhost:4173 --view --output=html --output-path=./lighthouse-report.html --preset=desktop && kill $!
scripts.lighthouse:mobile: pnpm build && pnpm preview --port 4173 & sleep 3 && lighthouse http://localhost:4173 --view --output=html --output-path=./lighthouse-mobile-report.html --preset=perf --throttling.cpuSlowdownMultiplier=4 --screenEmulation.mobile=true && kill $!
